.. _bjsonrpc.proxies:

Module bjsonrpc.proxies
-------------------------    

This module contains only one Proxy, and it is intended for internal use. 
Generally you should access to proxies using *Connections* and *RemoteObject* 
classes.

.. autoclass:: bjsonrpc.proxies.Proxy
    :members:
    :undoc-members: 
    :inherited-members:
